items.sentence: He was raised in the United States, but his native language is Japanese.
I arrived at the stadium at 4:00 p.m., but the game had already started.
Tom doesn\'t have to tell me about what happened if he doesn\'t want to.
Mary wrote something in Tom\'s notebook while he was away from his desk.
That may have been true when you were a kid, but it\'s not true anymore.
